name: CHOMP
messages: You sting %s with your bug-laden tail

name: Fang Bite
messages: You bite %s and thrash around wildly

name: Fangs Bite with Lupine Muzzle
//: Enemy must be of a similar size, logically trippable, and not flying.

name: Lucky Fangs Bite with Lupine Muzzle
//: Sometimes we can still get lucky and down fliers or big boys.

name: Incisors Bite with Rat Muzzle or Rabbit Nose
Pincer Strangle
messages: You crush the life out of %s with your pincer
<npcname> crushes the life out of %s with their pincer
condition_desc: * Only works on a <info>mundane</info> target of <info>similar or smaller</info> size

name: Hoof Kick
description: A powerful kick with sharp hooves

name: Toe Talons Kick
description: A powerful kick with sharp talons

name: Gore
description: Headbutt using a pair of horns or antlers

name: Tongue Stab
messages: You stab %s with your barbed tongue
